abstract: Some critics say a Facebook application called Honesty Box has become another weapon in the cyberbully’s arsenal.
snippet: Some critics say a Facebook application called Honesty Box has become another weapon in the cyberbully’s arsenal.
lead_paragraph: “I love you.” “I have a crush on you, but I’m too shy to tell you.” “You should brush your teeth more often.”
